Name: Triarii
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with Militiae Spear.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: While this Formation contains 10 or more models, then whenever an enemy Formation declares a charge against this Formation roll a D6 for each model in this Formation. For each roll of 6, the charging Formation suffers 1 Ethereal Damage.
Improve the Armour Save Characteristic of models in this Formation by 1.
